subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: “I think I’ve heard it all,” quarterback Tom Brady said on Monday after learning that the N.F.L. was looking into whether the Patriots deflated footballs on Sunday to gain a competitive edge over the Colts.
snippet: “I think I’ve heard it all,” quarterback Tom Brady said on Monday after learning that the N.F.L. was looking into whether the Patriots deflated footballs on Sunday to gain a competitive edge over the Colts.
